name: Smiling Face with Smiling Eyes
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes and a broad, closed smile turning up to rosy cheeks.

name: Grinning Face
description: A yellow face with simple, open eyes and a broad, open smile, showing upper teeth and tongue on some platforms.

name: Beaming Face with Smiling Eyes
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes and full-toothed grin, as if saying Cheese! for the camera.

name: Grinning Face with Big Eyes
description: A yellow face with simple, open eyes and a broad, open smile, showing upper teeth and tongue on some platforms.

name: Grinning Face with Smiling Eyes
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes and a broad, closed smile turning up to rosy cheeks.

name: Grinning Face with Sweat
description: A yellow face with a big grin, uplifted eyebrows, and smiling eyes, each shedding a tear from laughing so hard.

name: Grinning Squinting Face
description: A yellow face with a broad, open smile and scrunched, X-shaped eyes.

name: Smiling Face with Halo
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes, closed smile, and halo, usually blue, overhead.

name: Smiling Face with Horns
description: A face, usually purple, with devil horns, a wide grin, and eyes and eyebrows scrunched downward in the same manner as the üò† Angry Face on most platforms.

name: Winking Face
description: A yellow face with a slight smile shown winking, usually its left eye. May signal a joke, flirtation, hidden meaning, or general positivity.

name: Tongue
description: A tongue, sticking out. Appears similar to a coy smile, üòè Smirking Face.

name: Raised Hand
description: A hand with fingers splayed, indicating the number five. Used to represent the number five.

name: Hand with Fingers Splayed
description: A hand with all fingers splayed.

name: Vulcan Salute
description: A raised hand, with the fingers separated between the ring finger and the middle finger. Spock from Star Trek popularized this gesture.

name: Thumbs Up
description: A thumbs-up gesture indicating approval. Thumbs Up was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 under the name ‚ÄúThumbs Up Sign‚Äù and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

name: Raised Back of Hand
description: A hand with fingers splayed. May be used in conjunction with a face to suggest ‚Äúcall me‚Äù (please).

name: Tongue
description: A tongue, sticking out. Appears similar to a coy smile, üòè Smirking Face.

name: Pinching Hand
description: A hand with thumb and index finger pinched together. May be used in a similar context to the ‚Äúshushing face‚Äù emoji.

name: Sign of the Horns
description: A hand with thumb extended and index finger raised, making a traditional sign of the horns. May be used to represent heavy metal music and its associated culture.

name: Waving Hand
description: A hand waving most commonly used to say hello or goodbye.

name: OK Hand
description: A gesture showing the index finger and thumb touching to make an OK sign.

name: Pinched Fingers
description: A hand with thumb and index finger pinched together indicating a small amount.

name: Pinching Hand
description: A hand with thumb and index finger pinched together. May be used in a similar context to the 'shushing face' emoji.

name: Open Hands
description: Two open hands, representing openness or giving.

name: Raising Hands
description: Two hands raised in the air, celebrating success or achievement.

name: Palms Up Together
description: Two hands pressed together, palms facing up. May be used in religious or spiritual contexts.

name: Crossed Fingers
description: A hand with index and middle fingers crossed. Often used to wish for good luck or to show hope.

name: Love-You Gesture
description: A hand making a love-you gesture. Represents love or affection.

name: Handshake
description: A handshake, showing mutual agreement or cooperation.

name: Oncoming Fist
description: A fist, representing a punch or fist bump.

name: Raised Fist
description: A raised fist, representing strength or solidarity.

name: Right-Facing Fist
description: A fist facing right, often used to indicate a punch or fist bump.

name: Left-Facing Fist
description: A fist facing left, often used to indicate a punch or fist bump.

name: Thumbs Up
description: A thumbs-up gesture indicating approval.

name: Thumbs Down
description: A thumbs-down gesture indicating disapproval.

name: Backhand Index Pointing Left
description: A hand pointing left, with index finger pointing left.

name: Backhand Index Pointing Right
description: A hand pointing right, with index finger pointing right.

name: Backhand Index Pointing Up
description: A hand pointing upward, with index finger pointing up.

name: Backhand Index Pointing Down
description: A hand pointing downward, with index finger pointing down.

name: Middle Finger
description: A middle finger gesture, indicating displeasure or defiance.

name: Sign of the Horns
description: A hand with thumb extended and index finger raised, making a traditional sign of the horns.

name: Neutral Face
description: A yellow face with a flat, neutral mouth and eyes closed, giving a sense of neutrality or calmness.

name: Expressionless Face
description: A yellow face with flat, closed eyes and mouth, with a hint of blush on cheeks. May convey a wide range of emotions, including but not limited to, mild irritation, boredom, and frustration.

name: Face Without Mouth
description: A yellow face with simple, open eyes and no mouth, as if at a loss for words.

name: Face with Rolling Eyes
description: A yellow face with a small, closed mouth and eyes rolling upward. May convey a variety of moderately negative sentiments, including annoyance, skepticism, and sarcasm.

name: Smirking Face
description: A yellow face with a half-smile and wink, as if saying something sly or sarcastic. May include additional wrinkles in the forehead.

name: Unamused Face
description: A yellow face with slightly raised eyebrows and a flat, closed mouth. May convey a sense of frustration or annoyance more intense than suggested by üòê Neutral Face, especially in New Zealand and Australia.

name: Upside-Down Face
description: A yellow face with a small, closed mouth, flat or frowning, rolling its large, white eyes upwards.

name: Pensive Face
description: A yellow face with downcast eyes, a slightly raised eyebrow, and a single bead of sweat, as if overheated from straining. For Samsung devices, this emoji is featured with a closed mouth as a way of conveying a secret.

name: Confused Face
description: A yellow face with open eyes and a skewed, flat mouth, often used to convey confusion or concern.

name: Face with Raised Eyebrow
description: A yellow face with a single, exaggerated eyebrow raised high. May be used for a variety of interpretations, including skepticism, surprise, disbelief, or mild annoyance.

name: Confounded Face
description: A yellow face with an open mouth, raised eyebrows, and a forehead emanating both stress and confusion.

name: Persevering Face
description: A yellow face with closed eyes, furrowed eyebrows, and a stubborn or worried expression. May convey a variety of moderately sad or tense emotions, including concern, anxiety, dismay, unhappiness, or disappointment, but less intensely than üò≠ Loudly Crying Face.

name: Disappointed Face
description: A yellow face with a frown and closed, downcast eyes, as if aching with sorrow or disappointment.

name: Worried Face
description: A yellow face with open eyes, raised eyebrows, and a slightly open mouth, as if it's worried about something. May convey a variety of moderately sad or tense emotions, including concern, anxiety, dismay, unhappiness, or disappointment, but less intensely than üò≠ Loudly Crying Face.

name: Frowning Face with Open Mouth
description: A yellow face with small, open eyes and a gaping mouth, giving a yawn or acting surprised.

name: Anguished Face
description: A yellow face with small, open eyes, a slight frown, and furrowed eyebrows, from which a single bead of sweat drips, as if from concern or anxiety.

name: Fearful Face
description: A yellow face with raised eyebrows, a small, open mouth, and wide, white eyes, giving a sense of shock, surprise, or fear.

name: Weary Face
description: A yellow face with closed eyes, a slight frown, and a bead of sweat dripping from its forehead, as if it's weary, especially from hard work or exercise.

name: Grimacing Face
description: A yellow face with simple, open eyes and a broad, open frown, showing upper teeth. May convey a sense of awkwardness, embarrassment, or nervousness.

name: Anxious Face with Sweat
description: A yellow face with open eyes, raised or furrowed eyebrows, and a large, open mouth, as if gasping in shock or surprise. May convey a wide range of emotions, including disbelief, awe, fear, or dread.

name: Face Screaming in Fear
description: A yellow face screaming in fear, depicted by wide, white eyes, a long, open mouth, hands pressed on cheeks, and a pale blue forehead, as if it's literally screaming its lungs out.

name: Flushed Face
description: A yellow face with wide, open eyes, raised or furrowed eyebrows, and a flushed, red face. May convey a wide range of emotions, including embarrassment, shyness, or shame.

name: Pleading Face
description: A yellow face with large, puppy dog eyes, a slightly open mouth, eyebrows raised, and a slight tear on its cheek. May convey a pleading, begging, or puppy dog expression.

name: Downcast Face with Sweat
description: A yellow face with closed eyes, a slight frown, and a bead of sweat dripping from its forehead, as if it's stressed, worried, or overheated.

name: Exploding Head
description: A yellow face with an open mouth, the top of its head exploding, as if from overwhelming joy, pleasure, or excitement.

name: Sad but Relieved Face
description: A yellow face with a frown and closed, downcast eyes, shedding a single, blue tear from one eye down its cheek. May convey a moderate degree of sadness or pain, usually less intensely than üò¢ Crying Face.

name: Anguished Face
description: A yellow face with small, open eyes, a slight frown, and furrowed eyebrows, from which a single bead of sweat drips, as if from concern or anxiety.

name: Face with Open Mouth
description: A yellow face with small, open eyes and a big, round mouth, slack with surprise or shock, as if saying Wow! or Oh my!

name: Woozy Face
description: A yellow face with a crumpled mouth and a cockeyed expression, as if tired and emotional from inebriation or smitten with love. Depicted with raised or furrowed eyebrows and at least one eye half-open.

name: Sleeping Face
description: A yellow face with eyes closed and mouth letting out three, cartoon-styled Zzz‚Äôs overhead to indicate it's sound asleep.

name: Yawning Face
description: A yellow face with a wide, open mouth, eyes closed, and raised eyebrows. Often conveys physical fatigue or sleepiness, but may also represent boredom or disinterest, due to lack of sleep.

name: Sleepy Face
description: A yellow face with closed eyes, mouth slightly open, and a single, blue bead of sweat dripping from its forehead. May convey a wide range of emotions, including feeling tired, overworked, or unfocused.

name: Face with Medical Mask
description: A yellow face wearing a white surgical mask, as used by health workers in hospitals to prevent the spread of disease. Depicted with round, white-glazed eyes and a slight, friendly smile.

name: Face with Thermometer
description: A yellow face with raised or furrowed eyebrows and a thermometer resting on its face, as if it's measuring its temperature due to illness. May be used to represent various types of sickness, disease, and illness.

name: Nauseated Face
description: A sickly-green face with concerned eyes and puffed, often red cheeks, as if holding back vomit.

name: Face with Head-Bandage
description: A yellow face with a bandage wrapped around its head, covering one eye. May represent physical injury or pain but also emotional hurting, sometimes for ironic effect.

name: Smiling Face with Halo
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes, closed smile, and halo, usually blue, overhead. Often represents angels, prayers, and blessings.

name: Face with Thermometer
description: A face with a thermometer, often representing illness or a fever.

name: Face with Head-Bandage
description: A face with a bandage wrapped around its head, often indicating injury or pain.

name: Face with Medical Mask
description: A face wearing a medical mask, often representing illness or protection from sickness.

name: Nauseated Face
description: A face with a greenish color and an expression of disgust or nausea.

name: Face Vomiting
description: A face with a wide open mouth vomiting green vomit.

name: Hot Face
description: A face with a flushed red color, representing extreme heat or stress.

name: Cold Face
description: A face with blue icicles hanging from its cheeks, representing extreme cold.

name: Sleeping Face
description: A face with eyes closed and a small amount of drool coming out of the side of the mouth, representing sleepiness or tiredness.

name: Zzz
description: Three blue 'Z' characters representing sleeping or snoring.

name: Sleepy Face
description: A face with closed eyes and a slight frown, indicating sleepiness or fatigue.

name: Drooling Face
description: A face with drool coming out of the mouth, often representing sleepiness or desire.

name: Downcast Face with Sweat
description: A face with closed eyes and a drop of sweat on its forehead, indicating tiredness or relief.

name: Dizzy Face
description: A face with Xs for eyes, indicating dizziness or confusion.

name: Woozy Face
description: A face with uneven eyes and a wavy mouth, indicating dizziness or intoxication.

name: Confounded Face
description: A face with a furrowed brow and a pained expression, indicating frustration or distress.

name: Tired Face
description: A face with closed eyes and a furrowed brow, indicating tiredness or exhaustion.

description: A face with a furrowed brow and a pained expression, indicating frustration or distress.

name: Sneezing Face
description: A face with closed eyes and a tissue blowing from its nose, indicating sneezing or illness.

name: Tired Face
description: A face with closed eyes and a furrowed brow, indicating tiredness or exhaustion.

name: Worried Face
description: A face with a sad, concerned, and worried mouth.

name: Crying Face
description: A face with tears streaming down both cheeks. This face is distraught and inconsolable.

name: Loudly Crying Face
description: A face with open eyes and a big open mouth, screaming or crying out loudly.

name: Persevering Face
description: A face with tightly-closed eyes and a small, open frown.

name: Confounded Face
description: A face with scrunched, X-shaped eyes, furrowed eyebrows, and a mouth that is curved downwards.

name: Tired Face
description: A tired face with closed eyes, with an open mouth and drops of sweat.

name: Weary Face
description: A weary face with closed eyes, and a downturned mouth. Similar to a sad face, but with less intensity.

name: Pensive Face
description: A pensive, remorseful face. Saddened by life's experiences, but able to reflect on them in a thoughtful manner.

name: Disappointed Face
description: A face with a downward gaze, indicating disappointment. Similar to a sad face, but with a sense of resignation.

name: Anxious Face with Sweat
description: A face with open eyes and an open, cold sweat.

name: Fearful Face
description: A face with wide, white eyes and a big open mouth, frowning with fear.

name: Sick Face
description: A face with X-shaped eyes and a frown, indicating illness or feeling unwell.

name: Pouting Face
description: A face with a red, angry pouting mouth and furrowed eyebrows.

name: Angry Face
description: A face with a red, angry pouting mouth and furrowed eyebrows.

name: Face with Symbols on Mouth
description: A face with symbols on the mouth, indicating cursing or swearing.

name: Face with Steam From Nose
description: A face with a puffed-up cheek and a gust of air blowing from its nose.

name: Confounded Face
description: A face with scrunched, X-shaped eyes, furrowed eyebrows, and a mouth that is curved downwards.

name: Worried Face
description: A face with a sad, concerned, and worried mouth.

name: Pleading Face
description: A face with large, puppy-dog eyes, and slightly upturned eyebrows. It conveys pleading or begging.

name: Confused Face
description: A face with a confused, puzzled, or perplexed expression.

name: Pensive Face
description: A pensive, remorseful face. Saddened by life's experiences, but able to reflect on them in a thoughtful manner.

name: Relieved Face
description: A relieved face. Typically shows contentment or relief after a stressful situation.

name: Unamused Face
description: A face with a straight mouth and a raised eyebrow, signaling disbelief or disapproval.

name: Disappointed Face
description: A face with a downward gaze, indicating disappointment. Similar to a sad face, but with a sense of resignation.

name: Loudly Crying Face
description: A face with open eyes and a big open mouth, screaming or crying out loudly.

name: Anxious Face with Sweat
description: A face with open eyes and an open, cold sweat.

name: Downcast Face with Sweat
description: A face with closed eyes and a slight downturned mouth, showing a blue spiral on top of its head.

name: Sad but Relieved Face
description: A face with a subtle smile and closed eyes, showing relief and sadness at the same time.

name: Sneezing Face
description: A face with scrunched-up eyes, sneezing or blowing its nose into a tissue.

name: Crying Cat Face
description: A sad face with tears streaming down both cheeks. Depicted as yellow on major platforms.

name: Weary Cat Face
description: A yellow face with scrunched, X-shaped eyes, furrowed eyebrows, and a mouth that is curved downwards.

name: Pouting Cat Face
description: A yellow face with a scowling mouth and eyes, as if in a petulant expression.

name: Face with Symbols on Mouth
description: A face with symbols on the mouth, indicating cursing or swearing.

name: Broken Heart
description: A red heart broken in two. Used to express sadness or grief.

name: Bomb
description: A bomb, depicted as a black sphere with a burning fuse.

name: Dog Face
description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a dog, looking straight ahead. Depicted as a light-brown dog, of various breeds, in full profile on all fours facing left.

name: Cat Face
description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a cat, looking straight ahead. Depicted as yellow on major platforms.

name: Mouse Face
description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a mouse, looking straight ahead.

name: Hamster Face
description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a hamster, looking straight ahead.

name: Rabbit Face
description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a rabbit, looking straight ahead.

name: Bear Face
description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of bear, looking straight ahead.

name: Panda Face
description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a panda‚Äîa bear-like mammal known for eating bamboo‚Äîlooking straight ahead.

name: Koala
description: A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a koala‚Äîa bear-like marsupial known for eating eucalyptus and sleeping‚Äîlooking straight ahead.

name: Lion Face
description: The face of a lion‚Äîa big cat and king of the jungle‚Äîlooking straight ahead.

name: Cow Face
description: The face of a cow, a bovine farmed for its meat or milk. Depicted in full profile on all fours facing left with a black-and-white hide.

name: Pig Face
description: The face of a pig, a domesticated animal farmed for its meat. Depicted as a pink pig face with a neutral expression, pointed or floppy ears, and a round snout.

name: Pig Nose
description: The face of a pig, shown in a shade of pink with a fanciful swirl of its nostrils.

name: Frog Face
description: The face of a frog, the hopping amphibian. Depicted as a friendly, cartoon-styled green frog face with large eyes, slightly open mouth, and nostrils.

name: Monkey Face
description: The face of a monkey, shown with a long muzzle and cheeky grin. Depicted as a brown-haired monkey with a tan or pinkish face, round ears, nostrils, and a moouth.

name: Monkey
description: A monkey, a small primate with long arms and tail. Depicted in full profile on all fours facing left, with a long tail and upright, rounded ears.

name: Gorilla
description: A gorilla, the powerful, black-haired great ape. Depicted facing forward standing on its legs with a large, brown, shaggy coat and prominent forehead.

name: Orangutan
description: An orangutan, the long-haired, orange-colored great ape with an upright posture. Depicted as a shaggy, orange or brown gorilla, with long limbs and cheek pads.

name: Horse Face
description: The face of a horse, looking straight ahead. Shown facing forward, with a light-brown or grayish coat, hooves, and distinctive snout.

name: Unicorn Face
description: The face of a unicorn, a mythical creature in the form of a horse with a single, spiraling horn on its forehead.

name: Horse
description: A horse, a hoofed mammal used for riding and racing. Depicted as a brown horse in full profile galloping to the left, with a dark, flowing mane and tail.

name: Deer
description: A deer, a majestic creature known for its grace and beauty. Depicted as a brown deer with a pair of antlers.

name: Goat
description: A goat, a domesticated animal raised for its milk and meat. Depicted as a brown goat in full profile facing left, a tuft of brown, white, or gray fur on its head, and both horns.

name: Ram
description: A ram, a male sheep with large, spiral horns. Depicted in full profile on all fours facing left.

name: Ewe
description: A ewe, a female sheep with white or gray wool. Depicted in full profile on all fours facing left.

name: Camel
description: A camel, a long-necked mammal with two large humps on its back. Depicted in full profile on all fours facing left.

name: Two-Hump Camel
description: A two-hump camel, a long-necked mammal with two large humps on its back. Depicted in full profile on all fours facing left.

name: Llama
description: A llama, a long-necked, woolly-haired mammal native to South America. Depicted in full profile on all fours facing left.

name: Giraffe
description: A giraffe, the tallest land animal, with spots and a long neck. Depicted in full profile on all fours facing left.

name: Elephant
description: An elephant, the largest land animal on Earth, with a long trunk and, often, tusks. Depicted in full profile on all fours facing left.

name: Mammoth
description: A mammoth, a large, extinct elephant-like mammal with long, curved tusks. Depicted in full profile on all fours facing left.

name: Whale
description: A whale, the massive marine mammal. Depicted as a large, blue whale with a white belly.

name: Spouting Whale
description: A whale, the massive marine mammal. Depicted as a blue whale with a stream of water or spray spouting from its blowhole.

name: Dolphin
description: A dolphin, the sleek marine mammal known for its intelligence and playful behavior. Depicted as a blue dolphin jumping out of the water.

name: Seal
description: A seal, a sleek marine mammal with flippers. Depicted in gray or brown, facing forward or to the left, with whiskers and, on most platforms, a cute, flipper-like tail.

name: Octopus
description: An octopus, a sea animal with eight legs. Depicted as a pink or orange octopus with long, large tentacles.

name: Squid
description: A squid, a sea animal with ten tentacles. Depicted as a light-green squid with a long, tubular body and two long, thin tentacles.

name: Shrimp
description: A shrimp, a small crustacean with a long tail. Depicted as a pink or orange shrimp in full profile facing left, with a shrimp shell and small, whisker-like legs.

name: Lobster
description: A lobster, a large marine crustacean with a cylindrical body and long antennae. Depicted as a red lobster, facing forward or to the left, with claws outstretched.

name: Crab
description: A crab, a squat crustacean with pincers. Depicted as a reddish-orange crab (as cooked) shown from above, with a round, shelled body, shorted, angled pincers, legs, and lateral plates.

name: Shark
description: A shark, a large predatory fish with sharp teeth. Depicted as a gray shark with a white underbelly, dorsal fin, and sharp teeth.

name: Crocodile
description: A crocodile, a large aquatic reptile. Depicted as a green crocodile facing forward with its mouth open.

name: Turtle
description: A turtle, a slow-moving reptile with a shell. Depicted as a green turtle facing forward with a brown shell.

name: Snake
description: A snake, a long, legless reptile. Depicted as a green snake facing forward with its tongue out.

name: Eagle
description: An eagle, a large bird of prey with a hooked beak. Depicted as a brown eagle in flight.

name: Owl
description: An owl, a nocturnal bird of prey with large eyes. Depicted as a brown owl facing forward.

name: Bat
description: A bat, a flying mammal. Depicted as a brown bat with its wings spread.

name: Dragon
description: A dragon, a mythical creature with serpentine or reptilian traits. Depicted as a green dragon facing forward with large wings and horns.

name: Unicorn Face
description: The face of a unicorn, a mythical creature in the form of a horse with a single, spiraling horn on its forehead.

name: Dragon Face
description: The face of a dragon, a mythical creature with serpentine or reptilian traits. Depicted as a green dragon face with large horns.

name: Grinning Cat Face
description: A smiling cat face with open eyes and a big smile, showing teeth. May represent a happy, playful, or mischievous cat.

name: Grinning Cat Face with Smiling Eyes
description: A smiling cat face with open eyes and a big smile, showing teeth. Also known as the cat version of the grinning face with smiling eyes emoji.

name: Cat Face with Tears of Joy
description: A cat face with tears of joy. Also known as the cat version of the face with tears of joy emoji.

name: Smiling Cat Face with Heart-Eyes
description: A smiling cat face with heart-shaped eyes. Also known as the cat version of the smiling face with heart-eyes emoji.

name: Cat Face with Wry Smile
description: A cat face with a sly or wry smile, often indicating mischief or smugness.

name: Kissing Cat Face with Closed Eyes
description: A cat face with closed eyes and puckered lips, as if it's blowing a kiss.

name: Weary Cat Face
description: A cat face with wide, open eyes and a gaped mouth, indicating shock, fear, or amazement.

name: Crying Cat Face
description: A cat face with closed eyes and a single tear streaming down its cheek.

name: Pouting Cat Face
description: A cat face with furrowed brows and a pouting expression, often indicating displeasure or annoyance.

name: Cat Face
description: A domestic cat, beloved as a pet. Depicted as a light-orange cat with pointed ears, whiskers, and a pink nose.

name: See-No-Evil Monkey
description: A monkey covering its eyes, representing the phrase 'see no evil.'

name: Hear-No-Evil Monkey
description: A monkey covering its ears, representing the phrase 'hear no evil.'

name: Speak-No-Evil Monkey
description: A monkey covering its mouth, representing the phrase 'speak no evil.'

name: Monkey Face
description: A monkey face, typically used to represent monkeys, apes, and other primates.

name: Monkey
description: A monkey, a small primate with long limbs and tail.

name: Gorilla
description: A gorilla, the largest of the great apes, known for its strength and intelligence.

name: Clapping Hands
description: A pair of hands clapping together, indicating applause or approval.

name: Open Hands
description: Two open hands, representing openness or giving.

name: Palms Up Together
description: Two hands pressed together, palms facing up. May be used in religious or spiritual contexts.

name: Raising Hands
description: Two hands raised in the air, celebrating success or achievement.

name: Thumbs Up
description: A thumbs-up gesture indicating approval.

name: Thumbs Down
description: A thumbs-down gesture indicating disapproval.

name: OK Hand
description: A gesture showing the index finger and thumb touching to make an OK sign.

name: Victory Hand
description: A hand with the index and middle fingers extended, making a V sign.

name: Crossed Fingers
description: A hand with index and middle fingers crossed. Often used to wish for good luck or to show hope.

name: Love-You Gesture
description: A hand making a love-you gesture. Represents love or affection.

name: Sign of the Horns
description: A hand with thumb extended and index finger raised, making a traditional sign of the horns.

name: Call Me Hand
description: A hand with thumb and little (pinky) finger extended, making a traditional phone-like shape.

name: Hand with Fingers Splayed
description: A hand with all fingers splayed.

name: Raised Hand
description: A hand with fingers splayed, indicating the number five.

name: Vulcan Salute
description: A raised hand, with the fingers separated between the ring finger and the middle finger.

name: Waving Hand
description: A hand waving most commonly used to say hello or goodbye.

name: Raised Back of Hand
description: A hand with fingers splayed. May be used in conjunction with a face to suggest 'call me' (please).

name: Middle Finger
description: A middle finger gesture, indicating displeasure or defiance.

name: Pinching Hand
description: A hand with thumb and index finger pinched together.

name: Backhand Index Pointing Left
description: A hand pointing left, with index finger pointing left.

name: Backhand Index Pointing Right
description: A hand pointing right, with index finger pointing right.

name: Backhand Index Pointing Up
description: A hand pointing upward, with index finger pointing up.

name: Backhand Index Pointing Down
description: A hand pointing downward, with index finger pointing down.

name: Index Pointing Up
description: A hand with index finger raised and pointing upward.

name: Crossed Fingers
description: A hand with index and middle fingers crossed. Often used to wish for good luck or to show hope.

name: Love-You Gesture
description: A hand making a love-you gesture. Represents love or affection.

description: A hand with thumb and index finger pinched together. May be used in a similar context to the 'shushing face' emoji.

name: Open Hands
description: Two open hands, representing openness or giving.

name: Raising Hands
description: Two hands raised in the air, celebrating success or achievement.

name: Palms Up Together
description: Two hands pressed together, palms facing up. May be used in religious or spiritual contexts.

name: Grinning Face
description: A yellow face with simple, open eyes and a broad, open smile, showing upper teeth and tongue on some platforms.

name: Grinning Face with Big Eyes
description: A yellow face with simple, open eyes and a broad, open smile, showing upper teeth and tongue on some platforms.

name: Grinning Face with Smiling Eyes
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes and a broad, closed smile turning up to rosy cheeks.

name: Beaming Face with Smiling Eyes
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes and full-toothed grin, as if saying Cheese! for the camera.

name: Grinning Squinting Face
description: A yellow face with simple, open eyes and a broad, open smile, showing upper teeth and tongue on some platforms.

name: Grinning Face with Sweat
description: A yellow face with a big grin and scrunched, X-shaped eyes, tilted on its side, as if rolling on the floor laughing.

name: Face with Tears of Joy
description: A yellow face with a big grin and scrunched, X-shaped eyes, tilted on its side, as if rolling on the floor laughing.

name: Rolling on the Floor Laughing
description: A yellow face with a big grin and scrunched, X-shaped eyes, tilted on its side, as if rolling on the floor laughing.

name: Smiling Face with Halo
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes, closed smile, and halo, usually associated with angels.

name: Slightly Smiling Face
description: A yellow face with simple, open eyes and a thin, closed smile.

name: Upside-Down Face
description: A yellow face with a small, closed mouth, flat or frowning, rolling its large, white eyes upwards.

name: Winking Face
description: A yellow face with a slight smile shown winking, usually its left eye. May signal a joke, flirtation, hidden meaning, or general positivity.

name: Smiling Face with Smiling Eyes
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes and a broad, closed smile turning up to rosy cheeks.

name: Face Savoring Food
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes, rosy cheeks, and several objects (e.g., food, sports equipment) stuck in its mouth.

name: Relieved Face
description: A yellow face with soft, closed eyes, raised eyebrows, and a slight smile. Often conveys mild relaxation, contentment, or gratitude.

name: Smiling Face with Heart-Eyes
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes, a closed smile, rosy cheeks, and several hearts floating around its head. Expresses a range of positive, happy, and affectionate feelings, especially being in love.

name: Face Blowing a Kiss
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes and puckered lips blowing a kiss, depicted as a red heart. May represent a kiss goodbye or goodnight and convey feelings of love and affection more generally.

name: Kissing Face
description: A yellow face with puckered lips kissing.

name: Kissing Face with Smiling Eyes
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes and puckered lips kissing.

name: Kissing Face with Closed Eyes
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes, rosy cheeks, and puckered lips, blowing a kiss. More affectionate than the kissing face emoji.

name: Smiling Face
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes and a closed smile.

name: Hugging Face
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes, a closed smile, and open hands, as if giving a hug. May be used to offer thanks and support, show love and care, or express warm, positive feelings more generally.

name: Thinking Face
description: A yellow face with furrowed eyebrows looking upwards with thumb and index finger resting on its chin, pondering a concept.

name: Neutral Face
description: A yellow face with flat, closed eyes and mouth.

name: Expressionless Face
description: A yellow face with flat, closed eyes and mouth.

name: Face Without Mouth
description: A yellow face with simple, open eyes and no mouth, as if at a loss for words.

name: Face with Rolling Eyes
description: A yellow face with a small, closed mouth, flat or frowning, rolling its large, white eyes upwards.

name: Smirking Face
description: A yellow face with a sly, smug, mischievous, or suggestive facial expression.

name: Suffering Face
description: A yellow face with small, open eyes, a slight frown, and furrowed eyebrows, from which a single bead of sweat drips, as if from concern or anxiety.

name: Sad but Relieved Face
description: A yellow face with small, open eyes, a slight frown, and furrowed eyebrows, from which a single bead of sweat drips, as if from concern or anxiety.

name: Face with Open Mouth
description: A yellow face with small, open eyes, a slight frown, and furrowed eyebrows, from which a single bead of sweat drips, as if from concern or anxiety.
